query.sql: select 6 id, 2 pid, '节点四' text from dual union select 7 id, 2 pid, '节点五' text from dual union select 1 id, null pid, '目录一' text from dual union select 2 id, 1 pid, '节点一' text from dual union select 3 id, 1 pid, '节点六' text from dual union select 4 id, null pid, '目录二' text from dual union select 5 id, 4 pid, '节点三' text from dual

query.name: area
query.sql:
select 1 area_id, null parent_id, '湖南省' area_name from dual union select 2 area_id, 1 parent_id, '长沙市' area_name from dual union select 3 area_id, 1 parent_id, '常德市' area_name from dual union select 4 area_id, 1 parent_id, '娄底市' area_name from dual
union select 11 area_id, null parent_id, '湖北省' area_name from dual union select 12 area_id, 11 parent_id, '武汉市' area_name from dual union select 13 area_id, 11 parent_id, '荆州市' area_name from dual
union select 21 area_id, null parent_id, '广东省' area_name from dual union select 22 area_id, 21 parent_id, '广州市' area_name from dual union select 23 area_id, 21 parent_id, '清远市' area_name from dual
